default_start_location.description: An initial location within the simulation.

sim_3e912d.name: Eleanor Hayes

persona.Name: Eleanor Hayes
persona.Physical_Appearance: 5'6", with wavy auburn hair and green eyes. Usually seen wearing comfortable clothing and sturdy walking shoes.
persona.Hobbies: Hiking, trying new craft beers, reading local history, volunteering at the animal shelter
persona.Skills: Public speaking, historical knowledge, beer knowledge, customer service, navigating Asheville
persona.Family_Background: Middle-class family, parents still living in Charlotte, one younger brother.
persona.Life_Goals: To become a local history expert and potentially open a small historical tour business.
persona.Notable_Achievements: Graduated cum laude from UNC Chapel Hill, received excellent customer service awards at previous jobs.
persona.Fears: Heights, public speaking failures, not being able to achieve her goals
persona.Strengths: Strong communication skills, historical knowledge, adaptability
persona.Weaknesses: Can be overly critical of herself, sometimes struggles to say no.
persona.Favorite_Foods: Anything from local Asheville restaurants, especially farm-to-table cuisine.
persona.Favorite_Music: Indie rock, bluegrass, local Asheville bands
persona.Dreams: To share her love of history with others and create a successful business.

sim_3e912d.last_observation: You decide to make coffee before getting ready for work.
sim_3e912d.current_action_description: Action: wait - Details: Waiting for the coffee to finish brewing.

weather.forecast_short: Mostly sunny this afternoon, partly cloudy tonight.

news_updates.headline: Asheville News: Tax Hike, Helene Recovery, Crime, and Airport Expansion
news_updates.summary: Asheville grapples with a potential property tax increase, ongoing Hurricane Helene recovery efforts, recent drug and gun-related arrests, and developments at the regional airport.

news_updates.headline: US National News: REAL ID Deadline, Gulf Debate, and Trump's Plans
news_updates.summary: The U.S. faces REAL ID enforcement, political friction over the Gulf of America bill, and potential changes to the name of the Persian Gulf by Trump.

news_updates.headline: Global Issues Dominate World News
news_updates.summary: World news includes Romanian election, mental health crisis, climate change impact, Gaza conflict, Ukrainian drone strikes, and global carbon pricing.

pop_culture_updates.headline: Pop Culture Buzz: Music, TV, Movies, and Celeb News
pop_culture_updates.summary: Katy Perry's tour is 'Disneyland on wheels', 'NCIS' gets a trailer, Affleck defends filming in LA, and celeb relationships heat up.
